txt.en: Many dead men from Byre Tor lay strewn about the town, unburied, defiled by the Orcs even in death.

Many dead men from Byre Tor lie strewn about the town, unburied, defiled by the Orcs even in death.\n\nThese men are not trophies of Orcs, but brave villagers who fought to save their town. They should be given a proper respite in death.
You have put many of the former inhabitants of Byre Tor to rest.\n\nThese brave men may now lie in peace, safe from the Orcs.
Tend to the corpses of Byre Tor's men ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Dead men lay strewn about the town of Byre Tor.\n\nYou should put the dead men to rest, for they should not be left out as trophies of the Orcs.
You have put many of the former inhabitants of Byre Tor to rest.
